get.summary: get the depth of the market
get.description: it is a combination of the orderbook and the swap liquidity.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description:
The index of the depth.
for example, if depth levels of market is 0.01, 0.1, 1, 10, 50, 100.
then the index of 0.01 is 1, 0.1 is 2, 1 is 3, 10 is 4, 50 is 5, 100 is 6.

parameters.name: MarketId
parameters.description: The market id.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description:
limit of the depth.
<remarks> Range from 1 to 100. </remarks>

asks.description:
Asks are sorted in ascending order by price.
<remarks>
In each list, the first element is the price and the second element is the volume.
</remarks>

bids.description:
Bids are sorted in descending order by price.
<remarks>
In each list, the first element is the price and the second element is the volume.
</remarks>

Ex3.Exchange.OpenApi.AppServices.ChainIn.description: chain information which is supported by the system

marketId.description: The market id for which the liquidity information is provided.

poolAmount.description: The total amount of liquidity in the pool.

poolVolume.description: The total volume of liquidity in the pool.

poolLiquidity.description: The liquidity information of the pool.

Ex3.Exchange.OpenApi.AppServices.GetSwap.description: The input for getting liquidity information.

o.description: The open price of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

h.description: The highest price of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

l.description: The lowest price of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

c.description: The close price of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

v.description: The volume of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

a.description: The amount of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

o.description: The open price of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

h.description: The highest price of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

l.description: The lowest price of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

c.description: The close price of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

v.description: The volume of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

a.description: The amount of the trading pair in the last 24 hours.

baseAssetId.description: The base asset id of the market.

quoteAssetId.description: The quote asset id of the market.

maker.description: The display information of the maker wallet. if null, means the maker is swap pool.

taker.description: The display information of the taker wallet.

p.description: The price at which the trade occurred.

a.description: The total amount of the trade.

t.description: The time at which the trade occurred in Unix time milliseconds.

Ex3.Exchange.OpenApi.AppServices.MarketT.description: Represents the result of a trading history entry.

contractAddress.description: address of smart contract. e.g., eth address for erc20, ticker for krc20

isBaseToken.description: the asset can be used only used as base token if true

contractAddress.description: address of smart contract. e.g., eth address for erc20, ticker for krc20

timestamp.description: the current timestamp in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.

hin.description: The HIN (Hibit chain identity number) of the wallet
